poems.title: डपु अथमु
hoverText: In an alternate version, this line was: 'मुद्दत खां मुंहिंजी दिल, फ़िक्रमंदु रही आहे -'
In an alternate version, this line was: 'For so long now, my heart has gone on, heavy with worry—'

original: डपु अथमु ..
{मुद्दत खां मुंहिंजी तबीअत,
तमामु फ़िक्रमंद रही आहे -}
डपु अथमु मुंहिंजी मिठिड़ी ॿोली,
ॾुख्यो साहु खणी रही आहे.
डपु अथमु ..
मुअन-जे-दड़े जी अज़मत, ॾाहिर जी हुकूमत,
ससुई-पुन्हूं, उमर-मारुई जी मुहबत,
सचल, सामी, शाह जा दिल-सां अॾी,
सा इमारत हाणु डही रही आहे !
डपु अथमु ..
धार्यनि त न कयो ही कमु आहे,
घर में ई को वेठो विभीषणु आहे,
माली आ वाली जंहिं चमन जो -
उन ई चमन में बाहि लॻाई आहे !
डपु अथमु ..
घुर्जे हिकु रहबर, पैग़म्बर अहिड़ो,
जो स्वार्थु छॾे, कोम अॾे, अहिड़ो,
जाॻो उथो बदल्यो, हीअ रहनुमाई
जा महज़ नाटक करे रही आहे !!
डपु अथमु ..
सिंधी आहियो त बचायो सिंधी ॿोली,
सिंधी आहियो त ॻाल्हायो सिंधी ॿोली,
अदब जो कयो अदब, न कि साणु ठिठोली,
लियाकत, सियासत जी मार सही रही आहे
डपु अथमु ..
चोॼ सां मूं पाल्या, निभाया रिश्ता,
ॿियनि त कयो, जो कयो, सो कयो,
मौत मुहिंजी जी फतवा ते, ऐ दोस्त,
तो बि त पहिंजी सही कई आहे !!
डपु अथमु ..
अला! जहिं चमन खे असां रतु-सतु ॾिनो,
उन जी सूंहं लाइ असां पहिंजो पाणु ॾिनो,
मतलबी भौरनि अची कयो आ उन ते क़ब्ज़ो
कोमल कमल कली, दाहं खणी आई आहे.
डपु अथमु ..
translation: I have fears…
{For ages, my entire being,
has been weighed down with worry —}
I have fears that my sweet mother-tongue,
is finding it hard to breathe.
I have fears…
The magnificence of the Mohenjo-daro, the reign of Raja Dahir,
the immortal love of Sassui & Punnu, of Umar & Marui,
the poetry from the hearts of Sachal, Sami, and Shah,
this entire fortress is crumbling down!
I have fears…
It is not that strangers have done this deed,
there sits a Vibhishana [traitor] in our home,
the gardener, the guardian of this garden—
it is he himself who has set the garden on fire!
I have fears…
We need a guide, a prophet-like leader,
one who abandons self-interest and lifts the nation,
the time has woken and changed,
these leaders are merely putting up a show!
I have fears…
If you are Sindhi, then save the Sindhi tongue,
if you are Sindhi, then speak the Sindhi tongue,
respect that which commands respect, don't make a mockery,
the merit of our literature is under political attack.
I have fears…
I nurtured every tie with fondness and care,
the others, they did what they did,
on the decree of my death, O friend,
you, too, signed your name!
I have fears…
Oh God, the garden to which we gave our blood and essence,
for whose beauty we gave our own selves,
selfish bees have come and taken over,
the tender lotus bud stands scorched and withered.
I have fears…
phonetic: Ḍapu athmu ..
Muddatt khān munhinjī tabiyat,
tamāmu fikramand rahī āhe -
ḍapu athmu munhinjī miṭhiṛī bhōlī,
dukhyo sāhu khaṇī rahī āhe.
Ḍapu athmu ..
Muan-je ḍaṛe jī azmat, Dāhir jī ḥukūmat,
Sassūī-Punhū̃, Umar-Mārūī jī muhabbat,
Sachal, Sāmī, Shāh jā dil-sā̃ aī̃,
sā imārat hāṇu ḍahī rahī āhe!
Ḍapu athmu ..
Dhāryani ta na kayo hī kamu āhe,
ghar mẽ ī ko veṭho Vibhīṣaṇu āhe,
mālī ā vālī janhĩ chaman jo -
un ī chaman mẽ bāhī laghāī āhe!
Ḍapu athmu ..
Ghurje hiku rahbar, paighambar ahiro,
jo svārthu chhaḍe, kaum lāe ahiro,
zāmāno utho badalyo, hī a rehnumāī
jā maḥaz nāṭak kare rahī āhe!!
Ḍapu athmu ..
Sindhī āhiyo ta bachāyo Sindhī bhōlī,
Sindhī āhiyo ta sālhāyo Sindhī bhōlī,
adab jo kayo adab, na ki sānu thiṭhōlī,
liyāqat, siyāsat jī mā̄r sahī rahī āhe.
Ḍapu athmu ..
Chōṛhi sā̃ mū̃ pālyā, nibhāyo rishto,
diyanni ta kayo, jo kayo, so kayo,
maut munhinjī jī fatvā te, ai dost,
to bhi ta pih̃ji sahī kayī āhe!!
Ḍapu athmu ..
Alā! jahin chaman khe asā̃ ratu-satu ḍhino,
un jī sū̃gh lāe asā̃ pih̃jo pāṇu ḍhino,
matlabī bhaurani achī kayo ā un te qabẓo,
komal kamal kalī, dāhã khaṇī āī āhe.
Ḍapu athmu ..

poems.title: वन्दे मातरम्
poems.titleTranslation: I Bow To Thee, O Mother

original: आज़ाद भारत जो वासी आं
भारत में थो मां साहु खणा,
सउली न मिली आ आज़ादी
क़ुर्बान थिया देशभॻत घणा.
वन्दे मातरम् .. वन्दे मातरम् ..
आज़ादीअ लाइ डिनो ॿलीदानु
उन्हनि वीरनि खे मुहिंजो सलामु,
हीअ जनमभूमी आ वीरानि जी,
भारत माता, आहे तोखे परनामु.
वन्दे मातरम् .. वन्दे मातरम् ..
आजादी बरकरार रखण में -
मुहिंजो बि निमाणो नातो आ,
आज़ादी हासुल करण में -
शहीदनि जो सिधो वास्तो आ.
वन्दे मातरम् .. वन्दे मातरम् ..
फख़ुर अथमु उन शूरवीर ते
हेमू कालाणी जहिड़े वीर ते,
जान कयांईँ क़ुर्बान वतन ते -
गर्दन में फंदो, जय हिंद चपन ते
वन्दे मातरम् .. वन्दे मातरम् ..
मुल्क आहे शुकुरगुज़ार तुहिंजो -
निविड़ी मञूं था उपकारु तुहिंजो,
कंदी रहु  पैदा, तूं औलाद अहिड़ी
मुल्क आहे माता, तलबगार तुहिंजो.
वन्दे मातरम् .. वन्दे मातरम् ..
translation: I am a citizen of free India,
in India I breathe my very life.
Freedom was not won easily—
many patriots laid down their lives.
I bow to thee, O Mother...
For freedom they offered their lives,
my salute to those brave heroes.
This is a birthplace of the valiant;
Mother India, Namaste to you.
I bow to thee, O Mother...
In keeping freedom secure,
I too bear a humble share.
and in winning this freedom,
the martyrs have a direct claim.
I bow to thee, O Mother...
I am proud of those brave warriors,
of heroes like Hemu Kalani,
who sacrificed their lives for the homeland,
a noose at the neck, “Jai Hind” on their lips.
I bow to thee, O Mother...
The nation is grateful to you,
bowing, we accept your sacrifice.
may you keep bringing forth such children,
the motherland longs for them still.
I bow to thee, O Mother...
phonetic: Āzād Bhārat jo vāsī ā̃,
Bhārat mẽ tho mā̃ sāhu khaṇā,
saulī na milī ā āzādī,
qurbān thiyā desh-bhakt ghaṇā.
Vande Mātaram.. Vande Mātaram..
Āzādī-a lāe ḍino qurbān,
unhanī vīrani khe munhinjo salām,
hī ā janam-bhūmī ā vīrani jī,
Bhārat Mātā, āhe tokhe parnāmu.
Vande Mātaram.. Vande Mātaram..
Āzādī barkarār rakhaṇ mẽ -
munhinjo bhi nimāṇo nāto ā,
āzādī hāsil karaṇ mẽ -
shahīdani jo sidho vāsto ā.
Vande Mātaram.. Vande Mātaram..
Fakhr athmu un shūr-vīr te,
Hemu Kalānī jahiṛe vīr te,
jān kayā̃-ī̃ qurbān vatan te -
gardan mẽ phando, “Jai Hind” chapn te.
Vande Mātaram.. Vande Mātaram..
Mulk āhe shukr-guzār tuhinjo -
niviṛī mañhũ thā upkār tuhinjo,
kandī rahũ paidā, tū̃ aulād ahīṛī,
mulk āhe mātā, talabgār tuhinjo.
Vande Mātaram.. Vande Mātaram..

poems.title: मां ग़लत ऐं तूं ई सही आहीं
poems.titleTranslation: I Am Wrong And You Alone Are Right
poems.titlePhonetic: Mā̃ Ghalat Aĩ, Tū̃ Ī Sahī Āhī̃

original: मां ग़लत ऐं तूं ई सही आहीं,
तो चयो त ठीकु ई चयो हूंदो.
मां अणॼाणु बेसमझु आहियां
तो भांयो त ठीकु ई भांयो हूंदो.
मुहिंजो किरदारु लाचारु हीणो आ
तो टौंकियो त ठीकु ई टौंकियो हूंदो.
मां तहज़ीब-तमदुनु खां अणवाकुफु
गहेलो करे तो ठीकु ई सॾियो हूंदो.
तो में लियाकत, मूं में हिमाकत आ
तो समुझो त ठीकु ई समुझो हूंदो.
तूं त जजु ऐं मां त मुजुरिमु आहियां
सज़ायाबु मूँखे ठीकु ई कयो हूंदो.
translation: I am wrong and you alone are right;
whatever you said, you must have said correctly.
I am ignorant and foolish;
if you thought so, you must have thought rightly.
My character is helpless and lowly;
if you mocked me, you must have done so justly.
I am unknowing of culture and civilization;
if you called me foolish, you must have called me correctly.
In you is competence, in me is stupidity;
if that's how you understood it, you must have understood it right.
You are the judge and I am the criminal;
to sentence me, you must have done the right thing.
phonetic: Mā̃ ghalat aĩ, tū̃ ī sahī āhī̃,
to chayo ta ṭhīku ī chayo hū̃do.
Mā̃ aṇjāṇu besamajhu āhiyā̃,
to bhānyo ta ṭhīku ī bhānyo hū̃do.
Munhinjo kirdāru lachāru hīṇo ā,
to ṭõnkyo ta ṭhīku ī ṭõnkyo hū̃do.
Mā̃ tahzīb-tamaddunu khā̃ aṇvākuf,
gahelo kare to ṭhīku ī sāryo hū̃do.
To mẽ liyāqat, mū̃ mẽ ḥimāqat ā,
to samujho ta ṭhīku ī samujho hū̃do.
Tū̃ ta jaju aĩ, mā̃ ta mujrim āhiyā̃,
sazāyābu mū̃ khe ṭhīku ī kayo hū̃do.

poems.title: चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
poems.titleTranslation: Tell Me, Why Did You Partition The Country?
poems.titlePhonetic: Cha-u, Mulk Khe Chho Taksīm Kayo?

original: तूं हितां-हुताँ जी ॻाल्हि न करि ..
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
छो भारत माता जा टुकिड़ा करे
इंसानियत सां ॾोहु संगीन कयो
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
लखनि हिंदुनि जी लदपलाण सां
आज़ादीअ जो मुखु मलीन कयो
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
वहिशी विरहाङे जी करे त्रासदी ..
मासूमनि जे रतु सां हथु रंगीन कयो
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
आज़ादी जी ख़ुशी त अथमु, पर
छो मुश्क सां लुर्क हमनशीं कयो
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
तूं हितां-हुताँ जी ॻाल्हि न करि ..
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
तूं हितां-हुताँ जी ॻाल्हि न करि ..
चउ, मुल्क खे छो तक्सीम कयो ?
translation: Don't talk here-and-there...
tell me, why did you partition the country?
Why did you cut Mother India into pieces,
and commit this grave crime against humanity—
tell me, why did you partition the country?
With the mass uprooting of millions of Hindus,
you stained the face of freedom.
tell me, why did you partition the country?
Turning separation into a brutal tragedy,
you dyed your hands red with the blood of innocents.
tell me, why did you partition the country?
I feel the joy of freedom, yes,
but why did you mix musk with tears?
tell me, why did you partition the country?
Don't talk here-and-there...
tell me, why did you partition the country?
Don't talk here-and-there;
tell me, why did you partition the country?
phonetic: Tū̃ hitā̃-hutā̃ jī sālāḥ na karĩ..
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?
Chho Bhārat Mātā jā ṭukṛā kaṛe,
insāniyat sā̃ drohu sangīn kayo -
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?
Lakhani Hinduṇi jī ladpalāṇ sā̃
āzādī-a jo mukhu malīn kayo -
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?
Vahishī virahā̃ga jī kare trāsadī..
māsūmani je ratu sā̃ hathu rangīn kayo -
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?
Āzādī jī khuśī ta athmu, par
chho mushk sā̃ lurk haman-shīn kayo -
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?
Tū̃ hitā̃-hutā̃ jī sālāḥ na karĩ..
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?
Tū̃ hitā̃-hutā̃ jī sālāḥ na karĩ..
cha-u, mulk khe chho taksīm kayo?

poems.title: वक्त, जवानी, मुहबत ऐं रुख़्सत
poems.titleTranslation: On Time, Youth, Love, And Leaving

original: वक्त खे त आख़िर अचिणो हूओ
सा घड़ी आई आहे, त आई आहे
थींदी हुई हर मोके ते महिफिल
मुद्दत ख़ां महिफिल न थी आहे
क़ुर्ब सां हू गडु घुमण लाइ चवनि
पर सरीर में सा सघ न रही आहे
करिणो त घणो कुछु करिणो हो,
वक्तु मुक़ररु, आरज़ू अधूरी आहे
सदा हयात चेई भले दिल ख़ुश कयूं
जा शइ ठही आ, सा नेठि ढही आहे.
हर वक्त त बुज़ुरुगी कान रही -
जवानी जी मौज बि माणी आहे
आलमु इश्क़ जो, हुसुनु बेहिसाबु
उहा उमिरि बि त मूं घारी आहे.
जिस्म जो जमालु, दिल जो कमालु
मौज-मस्ती में हयाति गुज़ारी आहे.
जवानी जा किसा मूं बयान कया
नौजुवाननि बि रीस कई आहे ..
वार भूरा भले, दिल त रंगीन आ
इश्कु हर उमिर जी ज़रूरत आहे.
शबाबे शराबु, अख्युनि जा प्याला
नज़ुरुनु सां पीआरे सो साक़ी आहे
जो मां चयो  बि न, सो तो कींअं ॿुधो ..
मूं अणॿुधी कई तो ख़ारि जा कई आहे
रुसे भली, रुसण जो खेसि हकु आहे
पर परिचाइण सां पर्ची बि वेई आहे.
वीचार अलग, दिल्यूं त जुर्यलि हुजनि
मतभेद सही, मनभेद में न भलाई आहे
ज़िंदगी जी जंग में मूं न हिमथ हारी
वफात अची बि वापस वई आहे ..
ईश्वर करे, शल रहिजी अचे
इहा ई इलतिजा मूं कई आहै
अदब ऐं क़ुर्ब सां अलविदा थियां-
धणीअ दरि मूं अरदास कई आहे.
हीउ टाइगर अञा ज़िंदा आहे
पिक्चर बि अञा बाक़ी आहे.
translation: Time had to come at last;
that moment has come, it has come.
Once, at every occasion there would be a gathering;
for ages now, there has been no gathering.
They call me, “Come—let's roam together,”
but in this body, that strength is no longer there.
There was so much to do—so much still to do;
time is fixed, and my wishes are unfinished.
“Live long,” they say—fine, let the heart be glad;
but whatever is built, in the end, collapses.
Not every moment belongs to old age—
the pleasures of youth must be tasted too.
The realm of love, the boundless beauty—
I too have passed through that age.
The body's grace, the heart's perfection—
I spent my life in revelry and delight.
When I told the tales of my youth,
even the young grew envious.
Hair may be grey, but the heart is still colorful;
love is a need at every age.
The intoxication of youth, the goblets of the eyes—
the cupbearer is the one who makes you drink with a glance.
I didn't even say it—how did you still “hear” it?
Without even listening, you declared me a thorn, an offender.
Be angry if you must, for anger has its own right;
but remember too the bond that once lived between us.
Let thoughts differ—hearts should still stay joined;
disagreement is fine, but bitterness is never good.
In the battle of life I never lost courage;
even when death came, it turned back.
May God grant that peace remains always—
this alone is the prayer I make.
With respect and with closeness, I bid farewell—
at my Lord's door I have offered this supplication.
The tiger within is still alive,
and the picture is still not over.
phonetic: Waqt khe ta ākhir ačiṇo hūo,
sā ghaṛī āī āhe, ta āī āhe.
Thīndī huī har moke te mahfil,
muddatt khā̃ mahfil na thī āhe.
Qurb sā̃ hū gaḍu ghumaṇ lāe chavani,
par sarīr mẽ sā sagh na rahī āhe.
Kariṇo ta ghaṇo kuchhu kariṇo ho,
waqtu muqarraru, ārzū adhūrī āhe.
Sadā ḥayāt chaĩ bhale dil khuś kayū̃,
jā shai ṭhiyā ā, sā neṭhi ḍhī āhe.
Har waqt ta buzurgī kān rahī -
jvānī jī mauj bhi māṇī āhe.
Ālamu ishq jo, ḥusnu behisābu,
uhā umur bhi ta mū̃ ghārī āhe.
Jism jo jamālu, dil jo kamālu,
mauj-mastī mẽ ḥayāt guzārī āhe.
Jvānī jā kisā mū̃ bayān kayā,
naujavānani bhi rīs kayī āhe..
Vār bhūrā bhale, dil ta rangīn ā,
ishqu har umur jī zarūrat āhe.
Shabābe sharābu, akhyuni jā pylā,
nazaruni sā̃ pīāre so sāqī āhe.
Jo mā̃ chayo bhi na, so to kī̃-aṇ ḍhutho..
mū̃ aṇḍhudhī kayī to khāri jā kayī āhe.
Ruse bhali, rusaṇ jo kheṣ ḥaq āhe,
par parichāiṇ sā̃ parčī bhi veī āhe.
Vīchār alag, diliyũ ta jūryal hujann,
matbhed sahī, manbhed mẽ na bhalāī āhe.
Zindagī jī jang mẽ mū̃ na himmat hārī,
wafāt achī bhi vāpas vaī āhe..
Īshvar kare, shal rahijī ache,
ihā ī iltijā mū̃ kayī āhe.
Adab aĩ qurb sā̃ alvidā thiyā̃ -
dhaṇī-a dari mū̃ ardās kayī āhe.
Hiu ṭaigar añā zindā āhe,
pikchar bhi añā bāqī āhe.

poems.title: संयम, शुहिरत ऐं दिल जो रोमांस
poems.titlePhonetic: Sanyam, Shuhirat Aĩ Dil Jo Romāns

original: मां मोट में चोट करण जे काबिल होसि
मुहिंजे संस्कारनि मूंखे चुप कराई आहे
दिल जो सुकूँ, रूह जी राहत
मुहबत जी दौलत कमाई आहे
न कोई शिकवो, न का शिकायत
फ़ौज ऐं मौज त मिलंदी रही आहे.
शुहिरत बि हिकु अजीबु नशो आ
उफ़! जुस्तजू में जानि गंवाई आहे
उहे ई गुल-फुल, कलियूं ऐं पंखुर्यूं
अला! सा महक न साॻी रही आहे
हुन कोशिश कई मूं अचणु न ॾिनो
मूं हार स्वीकार कॾहिं न कई आहे
रूमानी कॾहिं बि न ॿुढो थींदो ..
दिल जो रोमांस अञा जारी आहे.
translation: I'm perfectly capable of striking back where it hurts—
but my upbringing and values have made me stay silent.
The peace of the heart, the comfort of the soul—
I've earned the true wealth of love.
I've held no grievance, made no complaints;
both duty and delight kept coming my way.
Fame too is a strange intoxication—
alas, in that pursuit I lost so much of myself.
Those same flowers-buds and petals—
O God! That fragrance isn't there, and nothing feels the same
They tried hard, and didn't let me come my way—
yet I've never accepted defeat.
Romance never truly grows old…
the heart's romance is still ongoing.
phonetic: Mā̃ moṭ mẽ choṭ karaṇ je qābil hosi,
munhinje sanskārani mū̃ khe chup karāī āhe.
Dil jo sukū̃, rūḥ jī rāhat,
muhabbat jī daulat kamāī āhe.
Na koī shikvo, na kā shikāyat,
fauj aĩ mauj ta milandī rahī āhe.
Shuhirat bhi hiku ajību nasho ā,
uf! justajū mẽ jāṇi ganvāī āhe.
Uhe ī gul-phul, kaliyū̃ aĩ paṅkhuryū̃,
alā! sā̃ mahak na sā̃sī rahī āhe.
Hun koshish kayī mū̃ ačaṇu na ḍhino,
mū̃ hār svīkār kahĩ na kayī āhe.
Rūmānī kahĩ bhi na juḍho thīndo..
dil jo romāns añā jārī āhe.

poems.title: देश प्रेमु
hoverText: It is unclear if this two-line fragment is meant to be a part of this poem.
It is unclear if this two-line fragment is meant to be a part of this poem.

original: अहिड़ो कहिड़ो इंसानु आहे
जंहिं खे मुल्क लाइ मानु नाहें
जंहिं खे मुल्क ते नाज़ु नाहें -
जंहिं खे मुल्क लाइ समानु नाहें
सुहिणी सिंधु घाटी जा वारिस
ऐं विकसित विरासत जा वाली
शाह सचल सामी संदी सौग़ात
हीअ कोम असांजी भाॻशाली
आर्मी में असां जा जनरल
नेवी में असांजो एडमिरल
वायु सेना में एयर मार्शल
सिंधी आहिनि सेना में दल
हिन क़ौम ॾिना सियासतदान
हिन क़ौम ॾिना आलिम विद्वान
हिन क़ौम ॾिना वीर जवान
जे मुल्क मथां थिया क़ुर्बानु
अहिड़ो ई बांको बहादुरु
हुओ ॻभिरू नौजवानु
नाउ सन्दास हेमू कालानी
थियो मुल्क मथां क़ुर्बानु
आज़ादी नाहें सुथिरी मिलंदी
बिना क़ुर्बानी, बिना ॿलीदानु
महज़ अहिंसा सां न थियो आ
आज़ाद आसां जो मुल्क महानु
हेमू अंग्रेजानि खे चेतायो
मुल्क घुरे थो आज़ादी
आज़ादी जो जबिरो जज़्बो
आ इंक़लाब तूफ़ान आँधी
हाणे आसंजो फ़र्ज़ु इहो आ
आज़ादीअ खे रासु करणु -
मुल्क मिठे खे ग़द्दारनि खां
मुक्त रखण ऐं नासु करणु
भारत जा जयचंद ॿुधो,
मुल्क मिठे जी ललकार
तव्हां जी हर हरकत खे
असां कंदा सीं बेकारु
{धूओं ईएं त न उभिरंदो आहे
का त न्याणी किथे अघाणी हूंदी }
अमर शहीद हेमू कालाणी -
वंदे मातरम्. वंदे मातरम्.
translation: What kind of person is he
who has no respect for his country,
who feels no pride in his country,
who has no love for his country?
We are heirs of the beautiful Indus Valley,
guardians of a flourishing heritage;
the gift of Shah, Sachal, and Sami—
our people are truly fortunate.
In the army we have our generals,
in the navy, our admirals,
in the air force, air marshals—
Sindhis stand in every wing of our services.
This community has statesmen,
this community has scholars and sages,
this community has brave young soldiers
who have laid down their lives for the nation.
And what a fearless, gallant hero he was—
that lion-hearted young man,
named Hemu Kalani,
who gave his life for this country.
Freedom is not gained easily,
without sacrifice, without offering;
it was not by non-violence alone
that our great nation became free.
Hemu warned the British:
the nation demands freedom.
The fierce passion for freedom,
and revolution, storm, and tempest.
Now it is our duty
to safeguard this freedom—
to keep our sweet country free of traitors,
to root them out and wipe them away.
To the Jaichands [traitors] of India, listen-
this is the call of the beloved nation.
Your every move—
we will render it powerless.
{Smoke does not rise without a reason,
perhaps somewhere someone is burning.}
To the immortal martyr Hemu Kalani—
Vande Mātaram. Vande Mātaram.
phonetic: Ahiṛo kahiṛo insānu āhe,
janhi khe mulk lāe mānu nāhẽ,
janhi khe mulk te nāzu nāhẽ -
janhi khe mulk lāe samānu nāhẽ.
Suhiṇī Sindhu ghāṭī jā vāris,
aī̃ vikasit virasat jā vālī,
Shāh, Sachal, Sāmī sandī saughāt,
hī ā kaum asā̃jī bhāgya-shālī.
Ārmī mẽ asā̃ jā general,
nevī mẽ asā̃jo admiral,
vāyu senā mẽ air-marshal,
Sindhī āhin senā mẽ dal.
Hin qom dhiyā̃ siyāsatdān,
hin qom dhiyā̃ ālim vidvān,
hin qom dhiyā̃ vīr javān,
je mulk mathā̃ thiyā qurbānu.
Ahiṛo ī bā̃ko bahādur,
huo ḍhaphirū naujavān,
nāũ sandās Hemu Kalānī,
thiyo mulk mathā̃ qurbānu.
Āzādī nāhẽ suthirī milandī,
binā qurbānī, binā balīdānu,
mahaz ahiṁsā sā̃ na thiyo ā,
āzād āsā̃ jo mulk mahānu.
Hemu Angrezāni khe chetāyo,
mulk ghure tho āzādī,
āzādī jo zabro jazbo,
ā inqilāb tūfān, ā̃dhī.
Hāṇe āsā̃jo farz iho ā,
āzādī-a khe rās karaṇu -
mulk mithe khe ghaddārani khā̃
mukt rakhaṇ aī̃ nāsu karaṇu.
Bhārat jā Jaichand yad rakho,
mulk mithe jī lalkār,
tavhā̃ jī har harkat khe
asā̃ kandāsī̃ bekār.
Dhūõ īẽ ta na ubhirando āhe,
kā ta nyāṇī kithe aghāṇī hūndī.
Amar shahīd Hemu Kalānī -
Vande Mātaram. Vande Mātaram.

poems.title: हेमू कालाणी खे असां जो सलामु आ
poems.titlePhonetic: Hemu Kalānī Khe Asā̃ Jo Salāmu Ā

original: हेमू कालाणी सिंधियुनि जो शानु आ
हेमू कालाणी सिंधियुनि जो मानु आ,
मुल्क मथां कयाईं जानि  क़ुर्बानु आ
हेमू कालाणी क़ौम जो सनिमानु आ.
हेमू कालाणी खे असां जो सलामु आ,
हेमू कालाणी खे असां जो पिरनामु आ.
हेमू सूरवीरु हुओ, मन जो मीरु हुओ
मुल्कजो मानु हो, क़ौमजी तक़दीर हो,
मुल्क मिठेजी शमा जो हेमू परबानो हो
मुल्कजो मस्तानो हो, देसजो दीवानो हो.
translation: Hemu Kalani is the pride of the Sindhis,
Hemu Kalani is the honour of the Sindhis.
He sacrificed his very life for the nation—
Hemu Kalani is the true dignity of our people.
To Hemu Kalani, our salute,
to Hemu Kalani, our heartfelt bow.
Hemu was a brave warrior, a king of the heart,
he was the dignity of the nation, the destiny of his people;
for our beloved country he was a moth to the flame—
a nation's devotee, a patriot in rapture, madly in love with his land.
phonetic: Hemu Kalānī Sindhiyuni jo shānu ā,
Hemu Kalānī Sindhiyuni jo mānu ā,
mulk mathā̃ kayā̃ jāṇi qurbānu ā,
Hemu Kalānī qom jo sanimānu ā.
Hemu Kalānī khe asā̃ jo salāmu ā,
Hemu Kalānī khe asā̃ jo pirnāmu ā.
Hemu sūr-vīru huyo, man jo mīru huyo,
mulk jo mānu ho, qom jī taqdīr ho,
mulk mithe jī shamā jo Hemu parbāno ho,
mulk jo mastāno ho, des jo dīvāno ho.

poems.title: तूं नशीली निगाहुनि सां निहारीं छो थी
poems.titleTranslation: When You Look At Me With Intoxicating Eyes
poems.titlePhonetic: Tū̃ Nashīlī Nigāhuni Sā̃ Nihārī̃ Cho Thī

original: हूंअ त मां ईंएं बेखबर न थींदो आहियां -
तूं  नशीली निगाहुनि सां, निहारीं छो थी !
तोबहि कई मां, न कॾहिं न पीअंदुसु, मगर
तूं अख़िर्युनि जे प्यालनि मां पिआरीं छो थी !
हिन खिज़ां ज़िंदगीअ में अची वेंदी बहार -
तूं मूं सां, के घड़ियूं गॾु, न घारीं छो थी !
दहिशतगर्द फ़ितरत खां, मां थो पुछां -
मज़हब जी ग़ज़ब बाहि, तूं ॿारीं छो थी !
नाहक अची तोखे लुटनि, वैहिशी भौंरा
ऐ कली, इहो सितमु, तूं सहारीं छो थी !
अला! मूं त चुम्यो तोखे, महज़ु सूपिने में
तूं  लॼ  विचां, भला ईँएं शर्माईं छो थी !
translation: I wouldnt be so unaware, like this—
Why do you look at me with those intoxicating eyes!
I even swore I would never drink—
Why do you make me drink from the goblets of your eyes!
In this autumn of life, spring could still arrive—
Why don't you spend at least a few moments with me!
I ask your terror-struck nature—
Why do you ignite the fire of religion's wrath!
When savage bees come to rob you for no reason—
O tender bud—why do you endure this cruelty!
O God! I only kissed you in a dream—
Why do you blush and grow so shy!
phonetic: Hū̃-a ta mā̃ ī̃ẽ bekhabar na thīndo āhiyā̃ -
tū̃ nashīlī nigāhuni sā̃, nihārī̃ cho thī!
Tobhi kahi mā̃, na kahĩ na pīandusū, magar,
tū̃ akhiryuni je pyālani mā̃ piārī̃ cho thī!
Hin khizā̃ zindagī-a mẽ achī vẽdī bahār -
tū̃ mū̃ sā̃, ke ghaṛiyũ gāḍu, na ghārī̃ cho thī!
Dahshatgard fitrat khā̃, mā̃ tho puchhā̃ -
mazhab jī ghazab bāhi, tū̃ dhārī̃ cho thī!
Nāhak achī tokhe luṭani, vahishī bhaũrā,
ai kalī, iho sitamū, tū̃ sahārī̃ cho thī!
Alā! mū̃ ta chumyō tokhe, mahaz sūpine mẽ,
tū̃ laṛ vachā̃, bhalā ī̃ẽ sharmāī̃ cho thī!
